title: Streamixio
author: Streamixio
content: SlayerXSlayerX | EVM BASED PoW Community-Driven BlockchainSlayerX (SLX) is a decentralized blockchain that uses Proof-of-work and peer-to-peer technology with no centralized authority or government.Our blockchain aims to enable faster and more cost-effective cross-border transactions than traditional financial systems and provide individuals with control over their digital identities, reducing the risk of identity theft and enabling self-sovereign identity management.WHY CHOOSE SLAYERX?With SlayerX, you can participate in our decentralized network. SLX is a blockchain with a store of value and security that promotes Faster Transactions and Settlements.We have developed a system where We have pre-mined 2 m SLX Coins to be used as an early staking reward to the early members of the community.Staking will be implemented soon. We have also set a 5% fee on every block for further development of our project, like liquidity, marketing, and exchange listings.  ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❖ Tokenomics Block reward Block 1 to Block 840000: 60 SLXBlock 840001 to Block 1680000: 30 SLXBlock 1680001 to Block 2520000: 15 SLXBlock 2520001 to Block 3360000: 7.5 SLXBlock 3360001 to Block 4200000: 3.75 SLXBlock 4200001 to Block 4386667: 1.875 SLXBlock 4200000 to infinity: 0 SLXEnd Sum of all rewards = 98MPremine = 2M (Staking rewards for early users)Total Supply = all reward + Premine = 100M➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖

comments.author: notfairchild
comments.body: Kaspa is about to hit 10 blocks a second, why should we adopt a 1 block in 60 second blockchain?

comments.author: scorpio18
comments.created_time: September 22, 2023, 08:48:03 AMLast edit: October 14, 2023, 10:03:08 AM by scorpio18

comments.author: Etherchain Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: scorpio18 on September 22, 2023, 08:48:03 AMGuys, be very careful with this coin. When I stated in their discord that this is the same dev as etherchain, and they have the same problem with the chain start-up difficulty of just 32M where it should be 1T, and all the blocks that you guys mine get invalidated by dev so he can take all the blocks, the dev kicked me out of their discord.DO NOT MINE THIS COIN AND DO NOT BUY ITThe dev already has 2M coins and mined 16k blocks. You can see them here http://64.225.78.99:4000/accounts, and the dev and his friends mine all the blocks mined right now.For those of you who want to mine right now you probably can't, if you start the wallet with this option --verbosity 5 you will get this kind of messagehttps://cdn.coin-miners.info/Screenshot%20from%202023-09-22%2012-58-13.pngBlock explorer got stuck for 2 hours that's because the dev was mining himself :https://cdn.coin-miners.info/Screenshot%20from%202023-09-22%2013-46-54.pngAnd here is the current blocks explorer getting updated after 2 hourshttps://cdn.coin-miners.info/Screenshot%20from%202023-09-22%2014-26-02.pngWhy do you always mention Etherchain devs?

comments.author: scorpio18
comments.created_time: September 23, 2023, 09:26:00 PMLast edit: September 24, 2023, 10:50:02 AM by scorpio18
comments.body: Quote from: Etherchain Crypto on September 22, 2023, 12:26:45 PMQuote from: scorpio18 on September 22, 2023, 08:48:03 AMGuys, be very careful with this coin. When I stated in their discord that this is the same dev as etherchain, and they have the same problem with the chain start-up difficulty of just 32M where it should be 1T, and all the blocks that you guys mine get invalidated by dev so he can take all the blocks, the dev kicked me out of their discord.DO NOT MINE THIS COIN AND DO NOT BUY ITThe dev already has 2M coins and mined 16k blocks. You can see them here http://64.225.78.99:4000/accounts, and the dev and his friends mine all the blocks mined right now.For those of you who want to mine right now, you probably can't. If you start the wallet with this option --verbosity 5 , you will get this kind of message.https://cdn.coin-miners.info/Screenshot%20from%202023-09-22%2012-58-13.pngBlock explorer got stuck for 2 hours that's because the dev was mining himself :https://cdn.coin-miners.info/Screenshot%20from%202023-09-22%2013-46-54.pngAnd here is the current blocks explorer getting updated after 2 hourshttps://cdn.coin-miners.info/Screenshot%20from%202023-09-22%2014-26-02.pngWhy do you always mention Etherchain devs?  Aside from the thing about the difficulty problem that you stated in your discord that, this is happening because when you use geth to generate the genesis block, it gets generated with a low difficulty (ok, I understand this; you both devs made the same mistake), but there was the second problem where the dev mined all the blocks from 1 to 17000 which it happened on your chain too so because of those 2 similar problems which occurred on both coins I assumed is the same dev or there is a small group of people who is doing this kind of coins launch.
